Notes.Text:
This update to Adobe Flash Player 11.2.202.644 fixes the following security issues:

- type confusion vulnerabilities that could lead to code execution
  (CVE-2016-7860, CVE-2016-7861, CVE-2016-7865)
- use-after-free vulnerabilities that could lead to code execution
  (CVE-2016-7857, CVE-2016-7858, CVE-2016-7859, CVE-2016-7862, CVE-2016-7863, CVE-2016-7864)
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).

Vulnerabilities.Description: Adobe Flash Player versions 23.0.0.205 and earlier, 11.2.202.643 and earlier have an exploitable use-after-free vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.
